ChatWarningKickMessage: You're {darkred}Idle/AFK{default}. Move or you'll be {lime}kicked{default} in {lightblue}{timeAmount}{default} seconds.
ChatWarningMoveMessage: You're {darkred}Idle/AFK{default}. Move or you'll be {lime}moved{default} to SPEC in {lightblue}{timeAmount}{default} seconds.
ChatWarningKillMessage: You're {darkred}Idle/AFK{default}. Move or you'll be {lime}killed{default} in {lightblue}{timeAmount}{default} seconds.
AntiCampSlayMessage: {grey}{playerName}{default} was {lime}slayed{default} for camping in {green}@{zoneName}{default} with weapon {lime}{weaponName}{default}.
AntiCampSlapMessage: {grey}{playerName}{default} was {lime}slapped{default} with {red}{slapAmount} damage{default} for camping in {green}@{zoneName}{default} with weapon {lime}{weaponName}{default}.
AntiCampSlayWarningMessage: Stop camping in {green}@{zoneName}{default} with weapon {lime}{weaponName}{default} or you'll be {lime}slayed{default} in {lightblue}{timeAmount}{default} seconds.
AntiCampSlapWarningMessage: Stop camping in {green}@{zoneName}{default} with weapon {lime}{weaponName}{default} or you'll be {lime}slapped{default} with {red}{slapAmount} damage{default} in {lightblue}{timeAmount}{default} seconds.
